Html:
Hi

I'd like to see if is possible to know what are files (those that are essentials) that are needed for create an excel (2007/2003) with text in it (only text, in different cells) to download it. Your library is excellent, but is too heavy for my purposes (write text in an excel file).
Thanks

The bulk of PHPExcel's size is from Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/PDF. PHPExcel is about 23-24 MB, the PDF folder about 17 MB.

So if you do not use PHPExcel's PDF writer, you can safely delete the /PDF folder (I did).
And inclusion of the tcPDF library within the distribution will be dropped in the not-too-distant future
